termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.1: Masterspages builds technologies and services that enable people to connect with each other, build communities, and grow businesses. These Terms govern your use of Masterspages, and the other products, features, apps, services, technologies, and software we offer (the Masterspages Products or Products), except where we expressly state that separate terms (and not these) apply. These Products are provided to you by Masterspages.
termsOfService.2: We don’t charge you to use Masterspages or the other products and services covered by these Terms. Instead, businesses and organizations pay us to show you ads for their products and services. By using our Products, you agree that we can show you ads that we think will be relevant to you and your interests. We use your personal data to help determine which ads to show you.
termsOfService.3: We don’t sell your personal data to advertisers, and we don’t share information that directly identifies you (such as your name, email address or other contact information) with advertisers unless you give us specific permission. Instead, advertisers can tell us things like the kind of audience they want to see their ads, and we show those ads to people who may be interested. We provide advertisers with reports about the performance of their ads that help them understand how people are interacting with their content. See Section 2 below to learn more.

servicesWeProvide.title: 1. The services we provide
servicesWeProvide.1: Our mission is to give people the power to build community and bring the world closer together. To help advance this mission, we provide the Products and services described below to you:
servicesWeProvide.2: Provide a personalized experience for you:
servicesWeProvide.3: Your experience on Masterspages is unlike anyone else's: from the posts, stories, events, ads, and other content you see in News Feed to the Pages you follow and other features you might use. We use the data we have - for example, about the connections you make, the choices and settings you select, and what you share and do on and off our Products - to personalize your experience.
servicesWeProvide.4: Connect you with people and organizations you care about:
servicesWeProvide.5: We help you find and connect with people, groups, businesses, organizations, and others that matter to you across the Masterspages Products you use. We use the data we have to make suggestions for you and others. Stronger ties make for better communities, and we believe our services are most useful when people are connected to people, groups, and organizations they care about.
servicesWeProvide.6: Empower you to express yourself and communicate about what matters to you:
servicesWeProvide.7: There are many ways to express yourself on Masterspages and to communicate with customers and others about what matters to you - for example, sharing status updates, photos, videos, and stories across the Masterspages Products you use, sending messages to a client or several people, creating events or groups, or adding content to your profile.
servicesWeProvide.8: Help you discover content, products, and services that may interest you:
servicesWeProvide.9: We show you ads, offers, and other sponsored content to help you discover content, products, and services that are offered by the many businesses and organizations that use Masterspages and other Masterspages Products. Section 2 below explains this in more detail.
servicesWeProvide.10: Combat harmful conduct and protect and support our community:
servicesWeProvide.11: People will only build community on Masterspages if they feel safe. We employ dedicated teams around the world and develop advanced technical systems to detect misuse of our Products, harmful conduct towards others, and situations where we may be able to help support or protect our community. If we learn of content or conduct like this, we will take appropriate action - for example, offering help, removing content, removing or restricting access to certain features, disabling an account, or contacting law enforcement. We share data with other Masterspages Companies when we detect misuse or harmful conduct by someone using one of our Products.
servicesWeProvide.12: Research ways to make our services better:
servicesWeProvide.13: We engage in research to develop, test, and improve our Products. This includes analyzing the data we have about our users and understanding how people use our Products, for example by conducting surveys and testing and troubleshooting new features. Our Data Policy explains how we use data to support this research for the purposes of developing and improving our services.
servicesWeProvide.14: Provide consistent and seamless experiences across the Masterspages Company Products:
servicesWeProvide.15: Our Products help you find and connect with people, groups, businesses, organizations, and others that are important to you. We design our systems so that your experience is consistent and seamless across the different Masterspages Company Products that you use.
servicesWeProvide.16: Enable global access to our services:
servicesWeProvide.17: To operate our global service, we need to store and distribute content and data in our data centers and systems around the world, including outside your country of residence. This infrastructure may be operated or controlled by Masterspages or its affiliates.

funded.title: 2. How our services are funded
funded.1: Instead of paying to use Masterspages and the other products and services we offer, by using the Masterspages Products covered by these Terms, you agree that we can show you ads that businesses and organizations pay us to promote on and off the Masterspages Company Products. We use your personal data, such as information about your activity and interests, to show you ads that are more relevant to you.
funded.2: Protecting people's privacy is central to how we've designed our ad system. This means that we can show you relevant and useful ads without telling advertisers who you are. We don't sell your personal data. We allow advertisers to tell us things like their business goal, and the kind of audience they want to see their ads (for example, people between the age of 18-35 who like knitting). We then show their ad to people who might be interested.
funded.3: We also provide advertisers with reports about the performance of their ads to help them understand how people are interacting with their content on and off Masterspages. For example, we provide general demographic and interest information to advertisers (for example, that an ad was seen by a woman between the ages of 25 and 34 who lives in Madrid and likes software engineering) to help them better understand their audience. We don’t share information that directly identifies you (information such as your name or email address that by itself can be used to contact you or identifies who you are) unless you give us specific permission.
funded.4: We collect and use your personal data in order to provide the services described above to you.

commitments.title: 3. Your commitments to Masterspages and our community
commitments.1: We provide these services to you and others to help advance our mission. In exchange, we need you to make the following commitments:
commitments.3: When people stand behind their opinions and actions, our community is safer and more accountable. For this reason, you must:
commitments.4: Use the same name that you use in everyday life.
commitments.6: Create only one account (your own) and use your timeline for personal purposes.
commitments.7: Not share your password, give access to your Masterspages account to others, or transfer your account to anyone else (without our permission).
commitments.8: We try to make Masterspages broadly available to everyone, but you cannot use Masterspages if:
commitments.9: You are under 13 years old (or the minimum legal age in your country to use our Products).
commitments.10: You are a convicted sex offender.
commitments.11: We've previously disabled your account for violations of our Terms or Policies.
commitments.12: You are prohibited from receiving our products, services, or software under applicable laws.
commitments.13: 2. What you can share and do on Masterspages
commitments.14: We want people to use Masterspages to express themselves and to share content that is important to them, but not at the expense of the safety and well-being of others or the integrity of our community. You therefore agree not to engage in the conduct described below (or to facilitate or support others in doing so):
commitments.15: You may not use our Products to do or share anything:
commitments.16: That violates these Terms, our Community Standards, and other terms and policies that apply to your use of Masterspages.
commitments.17: That is unlawful, misleading, discriminatory or fraudulent.
commitments.18: That infringes or violates someone else's rights, including their intellectual property rights.
commitments.19: You may not upload viruses or malicious code or do anything that could disable, overburden, or impair the proper working or appearance of our Products.
commitments.20: You may not access or collect data from our Products using automated means (without our prior permission) or attempt to access data you do not have permission to access.
commitments.21: We can remove or restrict access to content that is in violation of these provisions.
commitments.22: If we remove content that you have shared in violation of our Community Standards, we’ll let you know and explain any options you have to request another review, unless you seriously or repeatedly violate these Terms or if doing so may expose us or others to legal liability; harm our community of users; compromise or interfere with the integrity or operation of any of our services, systems or Products; where we are restricted due to technical limitations; or where we are prohibited from doing so for legal reasons.
commitments.23: To help support our community, we encourage you to report content or conduct that you believe violates your rights (including intellectual property rights) or our terms and policies.
commitments.24: We also can remove or restrict access to your content, services or information if we determine that doing so is reasonably necessary to avoid or mitigate adverse legal or regulatory impacts to Masterspages.
commitments.26: We need certain permissions from you to provide our services:
commitments.27: Permission to use content you create and share: Some content that you share or upload, such as photos or videos, may be protected by intellectual property laws.
commitments.28: You own the intellectual property rights (things like copyright or trademarks) in any such content that you create and share on Masterspages and the other Masterspages Company Products you use. Nothing in these Terms takes away the rights you have to your own content. You are free to share your content with anyone else, wherever you want.
commitments.29: However, to provide our services we need you to give us some legal permissions (known as a ‘license’) to use this content. This is solely for the purposes of providing and improving our Products and services as described in Section 1 above.
commitments.30: Specifically, when you share, post, or upload content that is covered by intellectual property rights on or in connection with our Products, you grant us a non-exclusive, transferable, sub-licensable, royalty-free, and worldwide license to host, use, distribute, modify, run, copy, publicly perform or display, translate, and create derivative works of your content (consistent with your privacy and application settings). This means, for example, that if you share a photo on Masterspages, you give us permission to store, copy, and share it with others (again, consistent with your settings) such as service providers that support our service or other Masterspages Products you use. This license will end when your content is deleted from our systems.
commitments.31: You can delete content individually or all at once by deleting your account. You can download a copy of your data at any time before deleting your account.
commitments.32: When you delete content, it’s no longer visible to other users, however it may continue to exist elsewhere on our systems where:
commitments.33: immediate deletion is not possible due to technical limitations (in which case, your content will be deleted within a maximum of 90 days from when you delete it);
commitments.34: your content has been used by others in accordance with this license and they have not deleted it (in which case this license will continue to apply until that content is deleted);
commitments.35: where immediate deletion would restrict our ability to:
commitments.36: investigate or identify illegal activity or violations of our terms and policies (for example, to identify or investigate misuse of our Products or systems);
commitments.37: comply with a legal obligation, such as the preservation of evidence;
commitments.38: comply with a request of a judicial or administrative authority, law enforcement or a government agency;
commitments.39: in which case, the content will be retained for no longer than is necessary for the purposes for which it has been retained (the exact duration will vary on a case-by-case basis).
commitments.40: In each of the above cases, this license will continue until the content has been fully deleted.
commitments.41: Permission to use your name, profile picture, and information about your actions with ads and sponsored content: You give us permission to use your name and profile picture and information about actions you have taken on Masterspages next to or in connection with ads, offers, and other sponsored content that we display across our Products, without any compensation to you.
commitments.42: Permission to update software you use or download: If you download or use our software, you give us permission to download and install updates to the software where available.
commitments.43: 4. Limits on using our intellectual property
commitments.44: If you use content covered by intellectual property rights that we have and make available in our Products (for example, images, designs, videos, or sounds we provide that you add to content you create or share on Masterspages), we retain all rights to that content (but not yours). You can only use our copyrights or trademarks (or any similar marks) or with our prior written permission. You must obtain our written permission (or permission under an open source license) to modify, create derivative works of, decompile, or otherwise attempt to extract source code from us.

additional.3: We work constantly to improve our services and develop new features to make our Products better for you and our community. As a result, we may need to update these Terms from time to time to accurately reflect our services and practices. We will only make any changes if the provisions are no longer appropriate or if they are incomplete, and only if the changes are reasonable and take due account of your interests.
additional.4: We hope that you will continue using our Products, but if you do not agree to our updated Terms and no longer want to be a part of the Masterspages community, you can delete your account at any time.
additional.6: We want Masterspages to be a place where people feel welcome and safe to express themselves and share their thoughts and ideas.
additional.7: If we determine that you have clearly, seriously or repeatedly breached our Terms or Policies, including in particular our Community Standards, we may suspend or permanently disable access to your account. We may also suspend or disable your account if you repeatedly infringe other people’s intellectual property rights or where we are required to do so for legal reasons.
additional.8: Where we take such action we’ll let you know and explain any options you have to request a review, unless doing so may expose us or others to legal liability; harm our community of users; compromise or interfere with the integrity or operation of any of our services, systems or Products; or where we are restricted due to technical limitations; or where we are prohibited from doing so for legal reasons.
additional.9: You can learn more about what you can do if your account has been disabled and how to contact us if you think we have disabled your account by mistake.
additional.10: If you delete or we disable your account, these Terms shall terminate as an agreement between you and us, but the following provisions will remain in place: 3, 4.2-4.5.
additional.12: We work hard to provide the best Products we can and to specify clear guidelines for everyone who uses them. Our Products, however, are provided "as is," and we make no guarantees that they always will be safe, secure, or error-free, or that they will function without disruptions, delays, or imperfections. To the extent permitted by law, we also DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT. We do not control or direct what people and others do or say, and we are not responsible for their actions or conduct (whether online or offline) or any content they share (including offensive, inappropriate, obscene, unlawful, and other objectionable content).
additional.13: We cannot predict when issues might arise with our Products. Accordingly, our liability shall be limited to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, and under no circumstance will we be liable to you for any lost profits, revenues, information, or data, or consequential, special, indirect, exemplary, punitive, or incidental damages arising out of or related to these Terms or the Masterspages Products, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.
additional.15: We try to provide clear rules so that we can limit or hopefully avoid disputes between you and us.

other.title: 5. Other
other.1: These Terms make up the entire agreement between you and Masterspages regarding your use of our Products. They supersede any prior agreements.
other.2: Some of the Products we offer are also governed by supplemental terms. If you use any of those Products, supplemental terms will be made available and will become part of our agreement with you. To the extent any supplemental terms conflict with these Terms, the supplemental terms shall govern to the extent of the conflict.
other.3: If any portion of these Terms is found to be unenforceable, the remaining portion will remain in full force and effect. If we fail to enforce any of these Terms, it will not be considered a waiver. Any amendment to or waiver of these Terms must be made in writing and signed by us
other.4: You will not transfer any of your rights or obligations under these Terms to anyone else without our consent.
other.5: You may designate a person (called a legacy contact) to manage your account if it is memorialized. Only your legacy contact or a person who you have identified in a valid will or similar document expressing clear consent to disclose your content upon death or incapacity will be able to seek disclosure from your account after it is memorialized.
other.6: These Terms do not confer any third-party beneficiary rights. All of our rights and obligations under these Terms are freely assignable by us in connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, or by operation of law or otherwise.
other.7: You should know that we may need to change the username for your account in certain circumstances (for example, if someone else claims the username and it appears unrelated to the name you use in everyday life). We will inform you in advance if we have to do this and explain why.
other.8: We always appreciate your feedback and other suggestions about our products and services. But you should know that we may use them without any restriction or obligation to compensate you, and we are under no obligation to keep them confidential.
other.9: We reserve all rights not expressly granted to you.

mainPage.modernBusiness: Modern business management platform for self-employed professionals
mainPage.organize: Organize smooth flow of your business in the most efficient way in one place with MastersPages:
mainPage.helpImpress: Let MastersPages help impress your customers with ease and delight of doing business with you, while you devote all efforts to unleashing your full creativity. Your vocation is one of the biggest games of your life. With MastersPages you will enjoy this game even more. MastersPages will make sure your successes are recognized and rewarded.
mainPage.thrill: TREAT YOUR BUSINESS WITH A NEW THRILL!

firstSlide.title: Advertise and tell the world about yourself – Yourname.MastersPages
firstSlide.description: Every diamond shines best in its own ring – every person and every profession requires a tailored approach to make their creativity and skills glow.

icons.text1: Tell your story or pitch your services in text of video
icons.text2: Present your credentials – Education, Professional experiences
icons.text3: Brag your achievements – Post pictures, videos of things you made, or services your rendered
icons.text4: Let others speak for you - every job you do, every service you render makes someone happy.
icons.text5: Give your customers the pleasure of sharing their gratitude.
icons.text6: Underwriting – publish verified references and reviews of your works.
icons.text7: Set separate page for each of your talents

secondSlide.title: Communicate with your clients in one place – Messages.MastersPages
secondSlide.description: Let MastersPages bring order and organization to your business communications with clients. Everything relating to your business is stored in one place. Nothing is omitted or forgotten, any information is one-click-away.

icons.text1: Use MastersPages to chat and negotiate with your clients in one place
icons.text2:
Use effective deal closing format, which clearly fixes main features of your engagement and
' + 'consent of both parties - no chance for ambiguity
icons.text3: Report your execution and get confirmations and acceptance
icons.text4: Automatically send updates to your faithful customer base
icons.text5: Collect your customers feedback and reviews

thirdSlide.title: “Time is money”
thirdSlide.description: It is impossible to beat this famous quote by Benjamin Franklin, who was known for his productivity and various talents. In his 84 years, he became not only a prominent politician and diplomat, but also an actor, musician, inventor, and satirist. Plan and co-ordinate your work, make time work for you and take full control of the 4th dimension with MastersPages integrated time-management system:

icons.text1: Co-ordinate your time with your customers
icons.text2: Get remainders and impress your customers with your timekeeping
icons.text3: Plan ahead of make the most of 24h

fourthSlide.title: Note your jobs – Tasks.MastersPages
fourthSlide.description: Every job you make changes the Word. It’s worthwhile taking notes of what you’ve done. MastersPages helps navigate in the universe of your tasks and recollect all details:

icons.text1: Attach files to your jobs – Photos, Videos, documents, budgets, calculations, external links

fifthSlide.title: Organize your records – Reports.MastersPages
fifthSlide.description: Creativity and Diligence lead to customers and orders. Keeping track or jobs and payments could become messy as success grows. MastersPages remembers every hour you spent, every job you made, every order you delivered. Use MastesPages reporting system to store, retrieve and report your statistics:

features.text1: Create your account on MastersPages.com (Sign Up)
features.text2: Fill in your Master’s profile / Share your profile link via your advertising efforts (Facebook, Instagram, banners, tap-link, etc)
features.text3: Invite your customers to join your community on MastersPages
features.text4: Plan your tasks or get service requests from your customers
features.text5: Update your profile and Publish your works regularly
features.text7: Get new orders from new customers
features.text8: Enjoy the luxury of smooth, organized work flow and concentrate on your skills and creativity – MastersPages takes care of the hustle
